briefTitle: Association of Hepatitis C Virus With Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Association of Hepatitis C Virus Seropositivity With Breast Cancer Prognosis and Treatment Outcome
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Prevalence of HCV Seropositivity in Breast Cancer Patients.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Biopsy-proven invasive breast cancer.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with unknown viral marker status.
* Patients who did not complete their management at OCMU.
* Patients with multiple cancer diagnoses.
* Patients with virus-unrelated hepatic pathology.
